entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
